SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Address
Represents a physical address with street information, postal code and city.
AddressDao
Data Access Object class for managing Address entities in the database
AddressService
Service class to manage Address entities.
App
Class where we start the application can choose between cli or gui interface in arg when we launch
Bed
Represents a bed in a room, with maximum capacity and an ID reference to the room it belongs to.
BedController
Controller class for managing bed-related operations in the CLI interface.
BedControllerFx
Controller class for the bed menu interface.
BedDao
Data Access Object for managing Beds entities in the database
BedService
Service class that handles business logic for Bed entities
BedView
View class for displaying bed-related UI components.
CLIController
CLIController manages the command-line interface interactions.
CLIView
CLI view class for user interaction via the command line.
DashboardController
Class to see analysis on the beds
DashboardView
View class for displaying the dashboard UI components.
DatabaseUtil
Utility class for managing database connections.
EligibilityService
Service de gestion des règles d'éligibilité pour une personne dans une chambre.
Gender
Represents a person's gender with display name support.
GuiApp
Main class for Graphical user interface (GUI)
GUIController
 
GuiView
GUI view class for displaying the graphical user interface.
Knows
Represents a relationship between a person and an address they know.
KnowsDao
Data Access Object for managing Knows entities in the database
Main
class which use to do sql request test and class test
MainMenuController
Controller class for the main menu interface.
MainMenuView
View class for displaying the main menu UI components.
Person
Represents a person with various personal attributes such as ID, name, gender, age, place of birth, social security number, and an associated address.
PersonController
Controller class for managing Person-related CLI interactions.
PersonControllerFx
Controller class for managing Person-related GUI operations.
PersonDao
PersonDao is a Data Access Object (DAO) class responsible for managing database operations related to the Person entity.
PersonService
Service class that handles all person-related business logic including CRUD operations
PersonView
View class for displaying person-related UI components.
PlanningView
View class for displaying the planning schedule UI components.
Relationship
Represents a relationship between two persons (e.g., family, couple, etc.) and provides operations for assigning them to beds and searching availability.
RelationshipDao
Data Access Object class for managing relationship data between persons in the database.
RestrictionRoom
Represents an association between a Room and a RestrictionType with a logical operator.
RestrictionRoomDao
Data Access Object class for managing restriction room in the database.
RestrictionType
Represents restriction rules applied to rooms (age and gender).
RestrictionTypeDao
Data Access Object class for handling RestrictionType entities in the database.
Room
Represents a room that contains beds and applies restrictions.
RoomController
Controller class for managing Room-related CLI interactions.
RoomControllerFx
Controller class for managing rooms in the JavaFX UI.
RoomDao
Data Access Object class for handling Room entities in the database.
RoomService
Service class that handles all room-related business logic including CRUD operations and management of beds and restrictions.
RoomView
View class for displaying room-related UI components.
Stay
Represents a stay in a bed by a person for a specific time period.
StayController
Controller class for managing Stay-related CLI interactions.
StayControllerFx
Controller class for managing Stay-related GUI interactions.
StayDao
Data Access Object for handling stay-related database operations.
StayRow
Represents a row in the planning view table for a stay.
StayService
Service de gestion des séjours (Stay).
StayView
View class for displaying stay-related UI components.
ViewManager
Manages the different views of the application and handles stage configuration.
